arts.ttl: Chesterfield remain unbeaten at home after Cheltenham draw
Touchline conduct, injury blow and learning from mistakes - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn ahead of Chesterfield away - Gloucestershire Live
arts.sum: Look at Chesterfield now and it's a bit of a David v Goliath in terms of budgets and what they have compared to ours, but they have injuries to key players. The players' attitude and workrate has been really good and it's something I can't fault, but there are things we need to improve on and we will.
